description.jp: 長い眠りについていた記憶喪失の青年。古代人の生き残りであり 父オーエンの遺した塔を監視する使命を持つ。浮遊大陸の墜落直前で全てを思い出し命がけで動力炉の修理を果たした。仲間想いで 女性好きな印象を与える言動もするが実際は一途。
description.gl: An Ancient who lost his memory after a long slumber. His duty is to guard the tower his father, Owen, left behind. Immediately before the fall of the Floating Continent, Desch regains his memories and risks his life to repair the reactor. Though he appears to be a ladies' man, he is actually a devoted partner and caring friend.

jp.text: 捕まったのかい？\nドジだねー！！
やっと記憶がよみがえったぜ！
ずいぶん世話になっちまったな\nありがとよ
これが おれの使命だ……
なに言ってんだい\nおれが死ぬわけないだろ！

gl.text: Hah hah! I can't believe you let yourselves get caught!
It was fun being with you guys.

At start of quest:
 • Self: 6 turns Electric Area

 • 4-hit group Thunder melee BRV attack + single-target HP attack delivered 2 times becomes:
 • 4-hit group Thunder melee BRV attack + single-target HP attack
